name: Event Insight
author: OpenSums

sections.description:
This is the first public beta version of Event Insight. Please bear with us while we finish off a few tasks for the full release.

This plugin brings together information from different sources related to events. Sources currently supported are:

  • Ticket Tailor
  • Coming soon:
    • iZettle
    • Dutyman

Background

This plugin was created for a sailing club which started to use the ticketing service TicketTailor during the COVID-19 restrictions of 2020. The club wanted to be able to show who had booked a ticket for an event to the people running it without giving them access to TicketTailor itself.
sections.installation: Upload and activate Event Insight through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Why don’t you support the [xyz] service ?

Post a message in the support forum and we will look at it!
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Minor fixes and documentation tidying.

1.0.0

This is the first public beta version.

short_description: This plugin brings together data from different sources related to events.  The only source currently supported is Ticket Tailor.
